Free and paid version

The site is free and will always have open content (although older and unpolished). We hate ads, so we removed them entirely.

To support us and pay Frederico's bills, we created the Paid Newsletter. For R$ 20/month you get two weekly editions with fresh, deep, and polished content. Subscribers keep the blog running.

Two putos, one odyssey. This blog is a _hi.mundo! project. If you want to get in touch, use the footer links.
